channel.title: SecBrowser - Socks Connections Fail
channel.description:
In a vanilla Firefox browser I am able to Multihop my VPN via Network Settings ----> Manual Proxy Configuration ------> PROXY Host ---etc.
However, using these same settings in SecBrowser result in a fail to connect.
Any ideas?

item.title: SecBrowser - Socks Connections Fail
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This wasn’t tested during development.

See if this chapter helps?

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser/Advanced_Users#Change_Proxy_Settings

Read full topic
